tweet.text: RT @USEmbassyCairo: The Ambassador noted that Jeannette was a trailblazer for women in public service and that he was inspired to hear abou…
tweet.html: RT @USEmbassyCairo: The Ambassador noted that Jeannette was a trailblazer for women in public service and that he was inspired to hear about Jeannette's incredible life and achievements. He thanked Mrs. Plautz for sharing her sister's story with the Embassy.
